text: The Interregio-Express (abbreviated: IRE) is a category of trains operated by DB Regio which is only available in the German states of Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Bavaria, Saxony, Saxony-Anhalt and Berlin as well as in Switzerland (Basel Badischer Bahnhof, Schaffhausen, Kreuzlingen). It has fewer stops than Regional-Express trains. Category:Rail transport in Germany
title: Interregio-Express
